tool_description: Assesses the quality of text chunks using multiple metrics including readability, coherence, and information completeness.

chunks.description: Array of text chunks to assess

error_messages: Empty chunks array: Provide at least one chunk for quality assessment.
Invalid assessment metrics: Metrics must include at least one of [readability, coherence, completeness, diversity].
Invalid quality threshold: Quality threshold must be between 0 and 1.
Assessment failed: Unable to compute quality metrics for some chunks.
usage: Provide chunks and assessment_metrics arrays, optionally set quality_threshold and language. Returns quality scores and recommendations.

overall_quality_score.description: Overall quality score across all chunks

chunk_quality_scores.description: Individual quality scores for each chunk
